### Great Britain mainland

I'm interested in looking at only the mainland of Great Britain. The ONS provides high quality data from here https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/ons::countries-december-2023-boundaries-uk-bfc-2/about. I'm going to extract the mainland by st_cast("POLYGON") and discounting polygons with an area smaller than 2e10 m^2
